summary: A patch to make TKChildren compatible with the Unofficial Skyrim Patch
descriptionHtml:
This is a patch that makes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49756/]TKChildren[/url] carry over all the changes from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url].
It should load after all TKChildren plugins.

The patch version is to be used in addition to all and any [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49756/]TKChildren [/url]plugins and is compatible with my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51860/?]Freckle Face Skin texture[/url], and the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50064/?]Bigger Head Childrens Fix[/url].

It will conflict with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46156/?]The Prince and the Pauper[/url], but keep in mind that you do not need this patch if you use The Prince and The Pauper TKChildren patch because it already contains the USKP fixes.

I originally made it while I was creating a patch plugin as a tutorial. The tutorial for making USKP Patches for NPC Overhaul mods is [url=http://kidhedera.tumblr.com/post/78908928419/making-a-patch-for-uskp-and-your-favourite-npc-mods]available on my tumblr here[/url].


[i]Under Optional Files there is a merged version that contains all the TK Children esp's updated and patched to work correctly with USKP. Its the file you want to use if you have all the DLC. If you use it you can remove the other TKChildren esp files, you will only need TKChildren.esm.[/i]

Use the regular patch if you only have Vanilla or are missing any DLC.

The merged version does not work with The Prince and The Pauper or any other file that requires TKChildren as a master. It will however work with TK Bigger Head Skeleton Fix.

[b][size=3]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/size][/b]
If you download USKP TKChildren Patch just install and activate.
Example Load order:
 TKChildren.esm
 TKChildren_DB.esp
 TKChildren_HF.esp
 TKChildren_V.esp
 USKP TKChildren Patch.esp
 childskeletonfix.esp

If you download TKChildren Merged USKP Patch.esp install and activate and then remove the following files
 TKChildren_DB.esp
 TKChildren_HF.esp
 TKChildren_V.esp

Example Load Order
 TKChildren.esm
 TKChildren Merged USKP Patch.esp
 childskeletonfix.esp

[size=3][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49756/?]TKChildren[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]The Unofficial Patch Team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/?]Merged Plugins Script[/url]

[b][size=3]Recommended Mods:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50064/?]TK Bigger Head Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46156/?]The Prince and The Pauper[/url]
